start() - Method in class ss.pentago.test.network.AutomatedClient
Need to override to separate the starting and stopping, so we can start other threads in between.
start() - Method in class ss.pentago.test.network.AutomatedServer
Need to override because the start and stop need to be separated, otherwise in super.start() it would get stuck, waiting for the threads to close.
